mapper.select: SELECT id, USRID as usrId, ref_code as refCode, title, content, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM user_note WHERE USRID = #{usrId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, USRID as usrId, ref_code as refCode, title, content, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM user_note WHERE USRID = #{usrId} AND ref_code = #{refCode} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_note (USRID, ref_code, title, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{usrId}, #{refCode}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_note WHERE USRID = #{usrId} AND id = #{id}
